Name: Superhero Recruitment Simulator
About the game: Miss being in the office? Want a career in recruitment? Obsessed with superhero's? Superhero Recruitment Simulator is an opportunity for you to work within the industry as a recruiter! Match candidates to job descriptions! Make sure you send the correct candidates out and the correct amount! How to do well at work: • Match candidates to job descriptions, • Read over 100 superhero applications, • Get through the day despite open windows making your papers go everywhere, • Make sure colleagues don’t knock your desk, • Ignore your boss if they mess up your papers, • Don’t make your boss mad by incorrectly matching applications to job descriptions, • Don’t make your boss mad by sending out too many applications, • Don’t make your boss mad by sending out too little applications, • Don’t make your boss mad! Made with the Godot Engine. Now get to work!
